citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45 pm on July 17,
2023. The inspector knocked on the doors and called the contact phone number. The licensee answered and stated they
would not be able to make it home to conduct the inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45 pm on July 17, 
2023. The inspector knocked on the doors and called the contact phone number. The licensee answered and stated they 
would not be able to make it home to conduct the inspection. 
 
 
End Section
